txt.en: 'Greetings! Another pie for Diamond? Oh, she wants a Yonderboar pie, does she? Very good, very good! Let's get to work! You can use my oven and I will add in my secret spice mix!'
DNT - Pick up the picnic basket
Adamanda North-took's Grand Plan is nearly ready to be put into action. There is but one missing piece... of the pie.

'I bet you are wondering what we are going to trap in this net. I shall tell you! Not yet, however. Firstly, we need to set this trap with the best bait possible - one of Finola Whortleberry's meat pies!\n\n'Now then, everyone knows the best pies are Finola Whortleberry's wild boar and apple pies. I need to check in with our local Bounders, so while I do that, go on ahead and get some Yonderboar meat and some apples. You can pick up some fallen apples near the trees around the big farm in Tighfield. Yonderboar also like the fallen apples, so they might be near the farm too! Bring the meat and apples to Finola Whortleberry and then meet me up the road with pie in hand.'
Use the oven to bake a pie
Finola and her oven are located in Nobottle.\n\nFinola has asked you to use her oven to bake an apple and Yonderboar pie.
Diamond North-took can be found in Nobottle.\n\nBring the pie to Diamond.
'I could smell that pie from a mile away! So too shall our prey! Good work, friend!'
Yonderboars and fallen apples can be found below the apple trees about the northern farm in Tighfield.\n\nRosalinda North-took has asked you to collect Yonderboar meat and fallen apples.
Finola is in Nobottle.\n\nYou should bring the Yonderboar meat and apples to Finola Whortleberry.
The scent of spiced meat and apples fills the air!
